select rec_num from (select * from ingredient where
ingre_name like CONCAT('%',#{list},'%')
and sort='주재료') a group by rec_num having count(rec_num)>1 order by count(rec_num) desc, rec_num desc

select distinct rec_num from ingredient where rec_num in (select rec_num from ingredient where sort='주재료'and
ingre_name like CONCAT('%',#{list},'%')
group by rec_num having count(rec_num)=1)
select r.*,c.nickname,c.profile from recipe r left join chef c on r.email=c.email where rec_num=#{rec_num}
